long_description: Using incredibly strong vacuum pads for attachment, the SeaSucker Bomber Bike Rack temporarily mounts 3 bikes to the roof of your car without the hassle of permanently attaching rack hardware. Easy to mount, nonmarking, UV and weather resistant, the SeaSucker Bomber uses multiple vacuum cups to hold exceptionally well to glass or metal surfaces. 2-part rack includes a front mount with vacuum pads for the forks of the bikes, and a separate mount with vacuum pads to secure the rear wheels. Integrated vacuum pumps seal the cups to your vehicle; recommended for roof top, trunk or hatchback attachment. Thick, high-density polyethylene body offers excellent strength and durability. Heavy-duty fork mounts are lockable and easy to use. Includes the Bomber 3-bike rack, 3 rear wheel straps, 5g Lube Tube for vacuum pump maintenance and a spare SeaSucker vacuum pad and pump.
short_description: Using incredibly strong vacuum pads for attachment, the SeaSucker Bomber Bike Rack temporarily mounts 3 bikes to the roof of your car without the hassle of permanently attaching rack hardware.
